name: Candy Caterpillar
description:
Navigate your candy caterpillar through a fast-moving maze in this frantic game of skill and reflexes! Collect candy pickups to make your caterpillar grow! Collect handy power-ups to enhance your caterpillar's abilities! Survive as long as you can in Endless Mode, accumulate as many points as possible in Timed Mode, or work your way through 24 progressively-difficult challenges in Challenge Mode!

GAMEPLAY
Slide your finger left and right to move the candy caterpillar. Collect candy pickups to add to the caterpillar's length, but try to avoid hitting the numbered blocks which will reduce the caterpillar's length. If your caterpillar runs out of segments, it’s Game Over! Hit the power-up blocks to speed up, destroy nearby blocks, or gain temporary invincibility!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
- A fun and frantic test of skill and reflexes!
- Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
- Intuitive touch-screen controls!
- Suitable for players of all ages!
- Four different power-ups!
- Multiple Playing Modes, including Endless and Timed!
- 24 unlockable challenges to master!
- Catchy background music!
- Fun particle effects!
